title: PERVERTS CONTINUES SEXTING MY GF DESPITE WARNINGS, BEWARE OF HIM!
text:
PERVERTS CONTINUES SEXTING MY GF DESPITE WARNINGS, BEWARE OF HIM!   Advertisement 
Dear Editors, 
This guy is back, as I had previously post about him in other FB page that this guy had been harassing my gf with sexual text,and i lure him out and warned him, then take pic of his ic to make him promise that he won't harass my gf anymore. 
But today he text my gf today and say text wrong person, but in the first place why still have her number? So here I am sharing about this guy and I believe my gf is not the only one he harass, other pic is in the comment. 
Kane Chia A.S.S. Contributor Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
